text: If you use existing solution like piesync or other (if they support both HubSpot and cw) we can’t help you we don’t know how it work you have to see the support of your third party solution

Hey <@U01E3692GUF> Can you share JSON you used to create the HubSpot user field in the object schema?  I’ll try and recreate on my end see what might be going on. If you feel more comfortable feel free to DM me if there are things you don’t want to expose in this forum. If you don’t have the original JSON the GET `/crm-objects-schemas/v3/schemas/` works too
Hi team, i'm looking for connect OrderWise with HubSpot, anybody have some information about it? Thank you so much
OrderWise is a software from UK
I'll send you a PM, thank you!

<@U01EE5X004U> So the HubSpotutk value comes from a cookie after the HubSpot js has been embedded on the page. If you look in that screenshot, i use a custom nuxt method called `getCookie` that looks for a specific cookie and returns the value. there are a handful of modules that can help with this, or can do with just plain js.
Hey <@U01EEQAK3J7>!  Can you be more specific?
